tool.name: RaceID filter
tool.description: Perform filtering upon a count matrix and optionally generate an R object

configfiles.configfile: count_matrix = "$inp_count" filtering = as.logical( $filtering.do_filter.value ) output_table = "$out_table" output_rdat = "$out_rdat" #if $filtering.do_filter.value == "T": control_genes_filter = "$filtering.remove_nonendog.value" mintotal = as.integer( $filtering.default_filtering.mintotal ) minexpr = as.integer( $filtering.default_filtering.minexpr ) maxexpr = as.integer( $filtering.default_filtering.maxexpr ) minnumber = as.integer( $filtering.default_filtering.minnumber ) downsample = as.logical( $filtering.default_filtering.downsample.do_downsample.value ) #if $filtering.default_filtering.downsample.do_downsample.value == "T": dsn = as.integer( $filtering.default_filtering.downsample.dsn ) #end if rseed = $filtering.default_filtering.rseed #end if

param.name: inp_count
param.label: Count matrix
param.help: A spreadsheet file with the first row indicating cell IDs, and the first column indicating transcript or gene IDs

param.name: do_filter
param.label: Perform filtering?
param.help: An R data object will be generated in both cases.

param.name: remove_nonendog
param.label: Control gene name prefixes
param.help: If ERCC or other non-endogenous spike-in RNAs are within the data, please specify their prefixes (e.g. 'ERCC, HK00') in order to filter them out. (Leave blank if control genes were not used in the experiment.)

param.name: mintotal
param.label: Minimum total transcripts
param.help: Discard cells with less than this number of total transcripts before normalisation.

param.name: minexpr
param.label: Minimum expressed genes
param.help: Discard genes that do not express a minimum of this number of transcripts after normalisation.

param.name: maxexpr
param.label: Maximum expressed genes
param.help: Discard genes that express more than this number of transcripts after normalisation. Useful if genes have oversaturated counts derived from UMI data. Set to 0 to disable this step.

param.name: minnumber
param.label: Minimum Cells
param.help: Discard genes that do not have the minimum expressed transcripts in at least this number of cells

param.name: dsn
param.label: Average transcripts across this many samples
param.help: If this is set to 1, then sampling noise should be comparable across cells. For higher values, the data approximates median normalisation.
